102.name: Maguuma Explorer
102.description: You've explored the lush region that cradles the sylvari and provides refuge to the asura.

bits.text: Caledon Forest: Ruins of the Unseen
Rata Sum: Rata Sum Port Authority
The Grove: The Sea Rider's Gate

163.name: Conundrum Cubed
163.description: Navigate the strange ruins in Govoran Terraces.

201.name: Pig Iron Quarry
201.description: Braving the leaps at the Pig Iron Quarry.

392.name: Carrier Cacophony
392.requirement: You made it through Rabsovich's onslaught without dying while inside the Underground Facility fractal.

418.name: Charitable Charr
418.description: Now with twice the smoke and fire.
418.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in the Black Citadel.

422.name: Gift Stopper
422.requirement: Stop gift bringers in Snowball Mayhem.

562.name: Explorer's First Super Adventure
562.description: Immerse yourself in World 1's mind-blowing graphics.
562.requirement: Complete feats by playing through Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 in Exploration Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 1, Zone 1 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 2 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 3 in Exploration Mode.

699.name: Ascent to Zephyr Sanctum
699.requirement: Speak to the Sun Adept, Wind Adept, Lightning Adept, Poyaqui, Evon Gnashblade, and Ellen Kiel on your way to Zephyr Sanctum.

719.name: World vs. Kite
719.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in Obsidian Sanctum. (World vs. World)

798.name: Darkness Illuminator
798.requirement: Complete the third tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

803.name: Doobroosh Tranquilizer
803.requirement: Defeat Doobroosh after he gains max stacks of Hormonal Imbalance.

837.name: Was a Watchknight
837.requirement: Complete portal events while disguised as a watchknight during Scarlet's portal invasions in Gendarran Fields.

927.name: Twilight Assaulter
927.description: You're not welcome in this neighborhood, Scarlet.
927.requirement: Complete achievements along the Twilight Assault dungeon path.

942.name: Grandmaster Tailor
942.requirement: Reach rating  in the tailor discipline.

992.name: WvW Premier Season: 2nd Place
992.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1048.name: Halloween Costume-Brawl Champion II
1048.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

1092.name: Toxic Krait Historian
1092.requirement: Visit  krait obelisk shards around the world.

1121.name: Tower of Nightmares Survivor
1121.requirement: Survive  chamber in the Tower of Nightmares.

1125.name: Tower Molten Alliance Slayer
1125.requirement: Kill  of Scarlet's Molten Alliance minions.

1203.name: Aftermath Cobweb Cleaner
1203.requirement: Destroy the toxic spider queen's cocoons.

1215.name: Aftermath Hallucination Slayer I
1215.requirement: Kill  hallucinations triggered by toxic pollen.

1260.name: Wintersday Skritt Hit
1260.description: Give those stealers a snowball sandwich.
1260.requirement: Hit  skritt with snowballs anywhere in Tyria.

1280.name: Wintersday Snowball Slinger III
1280.description: Give players a cold welcome with a snowball.
1280.requirement: Hit  players with snowballs during Wintersday.

1301.name: Team Arena Two Wins
1301.requirement: Win  Team Arena Match in PvP

1337.name: Wurm Kleptomaniac
1337.requirement: Steal a bottle of rum from the shipwrecked pirate.

1377.name: Intruder Alert
1377.requirement: Purchase a sentry turret at the observatory and deploy it.

1397.name: Antitoxin
1397.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1397.requirement: Kill the Champion Toxic Wurm Queen in Lion's Arch.

1532.name: Harsh Detox
1532.requirement: Kill members of the Toxic Alliance in Lion's Arch.

1664.name: Sheltered from the Rain
1664.description: Story Instance: Trouble at Fort Salma
1664.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem thrasher without getting hit by its rain of spores.

1743.name: Phoenix Weapon Collection
1743.description: <c=@flavor>Show off your fiery side with this collection!</c>
1743.requirement: Unlock all  Phoenix weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1871.name: Daily Guardian Winner
1871.requirement: Win  PvP match as a guardian.

2058.name: Weed Killer
2058.requirement: Without dying, defeat four Mordrem lobbers before the south gate of Camp Resolve is breached.

2074.name: Dragon's Shadow
2074.requirement: Gain  invisibility power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2079.name: A Sparkling Demonstration
2079.requirement: Find and light 5 of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

2100.name: Daily Warrior or Thief Winner
2100.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or thief.

2120.name: Daily Thief or Necromancer Winner
2120.requirement: Win  PvP match as a thief or necromancer.

2148.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Outside Noble Ledges
2148.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2174.name: Totems of the Itzel
2174.requirement: Help the high priest recover the totems of the Jaaka Itzel tribe that are scattered throughout the surrounding jungle after the last Mordrem Guard attack.

2183.name: Twilight III: Dusk
2183.description: It is always darkest before the dawn, and within that gloom lies great potential and power. Use your crafted Gloominator to pull the gloom from the land in your journey to create the legendary precursor Dusk.

bits.text: Recipe purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use the Gloominator to capture the murk in the dark deeps of the Aquatic Ruins Fractal.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom in Bloomhunger's room in the Swampland Fractal.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in the Snowblind Fractal.
Use the Gloominator to capture the night after killing the Jade Maw in the Solid Ocean Fractal.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom in the treasure room of the Behem Gauntlet jumping puzzle in Blazeridge Steppes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness of the dark room in the Weyandt's Revenge jumping puzzle in Lion's Arch.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom after killing the Fleshgrazer at the end of the Forsaken Fortune minidungeon in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness of the dark room in the Obsidian Sanctum jumping puzzle in the Mists.
Use the Gloominator to capture the dim near the treasure room of the Spelunker's Delve jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom of the treasure room in the Tears of Itlaocol minidungeon in Caledon Forest.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness at a portal to Grenth's Domain in the battle for the Cathedral of Silence in Cursed Shore.
Use the Gloominator to capture the inky blackness of a dark cloud in the tar lake north of Sloven Pitch in Fireheart Rise.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom while in Tequatl's watery grave.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom while in the Lair of the Coil in Timberline Falls.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in the center of the Tangled Labyrinth in the Silverwastes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom in the treasure room of Provernic Crypt in Gendarran Fields.
Use the Gloominator to capture the murk in the treasure room of the Flame Temple Tombs minidungeon in Diessa Plateau.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in the Prosperity Mines in Dry Top.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom near the corpse of the Copper Husk inside the Breach beneath Red Rock Bastion in the Silverwastes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness inside the cave under Cereboth Canyon in Kessex Hills.
Use the Gloominator to capture the murk near the Shadow Behemoth in Queensdale.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in one of the test subject chambers in Vexa's Lab in Fireheart Rise.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom near the corpse of the Iron Troll inside the Breach beneath Amber Sandfall in the Silverwastes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom near the corpse of the Silver Teragriff inside the Breach beneath Indigo Cave in the Silverwastes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom near the corpse of the Platinum Thrasher inside the Breach beneath Blue Oasis in the Silverwastes.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom in the icy cavern of Tribulation Caverns in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in Rabsovich's room in the Underground Facility Fractal.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2187.name: The Bifrost III: The Legend
2187.description: Light shines upon the world, creating the colors around us. Study and create the color palette of the world using artistry and light. Channel this rainbow into your efforts to craft the legendary precursor The Legend.

bits.text: The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
The recipe for this paint is sold by Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of red paint to the scenic vantage point at the bottom of Mount Maelstrom.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of orange paint to the scenic vantage point on the high rock next to Lamia Mire in Plains of Ashford.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of yellow paint to the scenic vantage point by Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of green paint to the scenic vantage point atop the pillar in the Uplands Oasis of Dry Top.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of blue paint to the scenic vantage point at the top of the entry gate into Barrowstead in Frostgorge Sound.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of purple paint to the scenic vantage point in Kinar Fort in Blazeridge Steppes.
Harvested from the Jade Maw in the Solid Ocean Fractal.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a basilisk's beam attack.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a Wind Rider's beam attack.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel the Vinewrath's beam in the Silverwastes.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a golem's beam attack.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a chak's beam attack.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a branded woman's beam attack.
Use the Jade Maw Lens and a Quartz Crystal to channel a beam of ley-line energy at the back of the Cavern of Shining Light in Dry Top.
Become encased in The Shatterer's Crystal.
Test a Crystal Lodestone with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Ruby Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test an Opal Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Beryl Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Charged Quartz Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Mystic Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test an Emerald Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Sapphire Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Test a Potent Master Tuning Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2216.name: Hidden Amphibian
2216.description: All he wanted was a break...
2216.requirement: Defeat the irritable Itzel who's hiding out and whittling in his favorite spot.

2238.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 15
2238.requirement: Complete  scale 15 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2267.name: Auric Basin Insight: Eastwatch Bluff
2267.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2321.name: Pulse Room Glider
2321.requirement: Fly to the place of power in the Ley-Line Confluence.

2327.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 14
2327.requirement: Complete  scale 14 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2373.name: A Study in Gold
2373.requirement: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

bits.text: Eastgate: Where the Falls End and Nature Begins
Eastgate: A Great View of a Mighty Tree
Westgate: The Way Has Decayed Unless You Fly

Trial Rooms: Heavy Foliage Hides This One

2407.name: Bladed Armor
2407.requirement: Unlock all  Bladed armor skins in your wardrobe.

2418.name: The North Wind
2418.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the tempest's warhorn, North Wind.
2418.locked_text: Begin training the elementalist's tempest elite specialization.

bits.text: Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2446.name: "Plains of Golghein" Strongbox
2446.requirement: Search in the Ley Line Confluence area for the strongbox from the "Plains of Golghein."

2485.name: Adept Herald
2485.requirement: Begin training the revenant's herald elite specialization.

2494.name: Salvage Pit: Silver
2494.requirement: Gather supplies and avoid tendrils before time runs out!

2499.name: Salvage Pit: Gold
2499.requirement: Gather supplies and avoid tendrils before time runs out!

2500.name: The Bifrost II: The Perfected Staff
2500.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Legend has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Artificer to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to learn the secret to weighting a staff head.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the secret to balancing a staff shaft.
Speak to a Master Artificer to learn the secrets of superior woodworking tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2581.name: The Way In
2581.requirement: Work with local allies to gain access to a lost outpost.

2674.name: League Elementalist—Elite
2674.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2674.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as an elementalist.

2716.name: League Warrior—Veteran
2716.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Veteran achievement.
2716.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a warrior.

2750.name: Essence Collector—Recruit
2750.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2750.requirement: Purchase 1 Essence of Determination from the League Vendor.

2976.name: Daily Tier 1 Molten Furnace
2976.requirement: Complete Molten Furnace at fractal scale 1 or higher.

3172.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 60
3172.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3206.name: Codex: Kodan
3206.requirement: Acquire the Koda's Flame skills and speak with a Flamebearer to learn their history.

3226.name: Daily Bitterfrost Frontier Magic Gatherer
3226.requirement: Gather unbound magic in Bitterfrost Frontier.

3253.name: Saving Wintersday
3253.description: Everyone who celebrates Wintersday will thank you!
3253.requirement: Protect the Infinirarium from rampaging toys, or bring the cheer of Wintersday to the Secret Lair of the Snowmen.

3280.name: Spirit Watch Assaulter
3280.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during Spirit Watch rated matches.

3285.name: Eyes on Lake Doric
3285.description: Journal: Eyes on Lake Doric Completed
3285.requirement: Help Captain Thackeray and the Seraph assess the situation.

3298.name: Mechanical Killer
3298.description: Better technology equals more efficient murder.
3298.requirement: Defeat  player during Skyhammer rated matches.

3334.name: Jaded
3334.requirement: Defeat Cairn the Indomitable while the challenge mote is active.

3428.name: Terror of the Boiling Sea
3428.description: Of fearsome molten visage and mighty smoldering wings.
3428.requirement: Slay either the legendary Destroyer Aestus or the legendary Destroyer Ignis near the Boiling Sea.

3430.name: Fancy Flying
3430.description:
Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"Like a moth to the flame."
3430.requirement: Descend the chimney in the Heart of the Volcano instance without being hit by destroyer fireballs.

3433.name: Ring of Fire
3433.description:
Story Instance: Taimi's Pet Project

It burns, burns, burns...
3433.requirement: Avoid being hit by the ring of fire in Taimi's Pet Project.

3455.name: Be Reactive
3455.requirement: Defeat the mastermind in the Shattered Observatory while all the reactors are active.

3524.name: Dodger Danger
3524.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"Bob and weave."
3524.requirement: Succeed without taking damage from lightning.

3578.name: Renowned Adventurer: Elon Riverlands
3578.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts in the Elon Riverlands.

bits.text: Help Adisa collect Slivers of Vlast from veteran Branded.
Help Follower Xunn collect Forgotten Glyphs for decoding.
Help Follower Dawnwynn defeat Branded Forgotten at Augury Rock.
Help Assistant Foreman Kofi keep the people of the Gladefields safe.
Help Ebele prepare the way north for defectors.
Use a skimmer to help with training around the ranch.

3638.name: Domain of Vabbi Legendary Bounties
3638.requirement: Complete each legendary bounty in the Domain of Vabbi at least once.

3686.name: Open Skies: Desert Highlands
3686.requirement: Collect  relics to restore the Sunspear sanctuary.

bits.text: Defend Second Spear Nayrim from the Mordant Crescent in Kanuz Cache to acquire this relic.
Purchase this relic from Groffmok in Desert Highlands.
Purchase this relic from Tendaji in Desert Highlands.
Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
Collect this egg from the griffon roost in Desert Highlands.
Collect this egg from atop a pillar at Godfall Tower in Desert Highlands.
Collect this egg from above a sheltered tree in Desert Highlands.
Collect this egg from the nests of thieving hawkeye griffons in Desert Highlands.
Collect this egg from a ledge below Jinx Hollow in Desert Highlands.

3737.name: Shadows Provisions
3737.requirement: Discover Shadows provisions spread throughout the Desolation.

3746.name: Fire Dancer
3746.requirement: Joyously join in the fire dance.

3753.name: Last Rites
3753.description: <c=@Flavor>The elaborate rituals accompanying the funerals of Primeval rulers served as a bridge between the worlds of the living and the dead.</c>

bits.text: Discover the funerary text of the Primeval dynasty.

3766.name: Carrot Collector
3766.description: Search Highjump Ranch for carrots to help Unja and her springers.

bits.text: On the far side of a western rock tower. (2)
Lying in the shade on an island. (5)
Up on a rock flanked by two rivers. (6)
Along a path between two rock faces. (8)
In a grove in the eastern Uplands. (10)
At a bend in the river. (14)
In a small cave frequented by warthogs. (18)
At the base of a towering waterfall. (19)
Among tents staked above the stables. (20)
Near a small eastern fishing bridge. (23)
A golden carrot on a cliff overlooking the stables. (1)
A golden carrot looking down on a broken bridge. (2)
A golden carrot high up on a riverside butte. (3)
A golden carrot by a windmill with a view. (4)
A golden carrot on a rock tower near a bridge. (5)
A golden carrot lying a few short steps from mastery. (6)
A golden carrot on the thatched stable roof. (7)
A golden carrot at the mouth of a towering waterfall. (8)

3784.name: Daily Desert Highlands Bounty Hunter
3784.requirement: Complete a bounty in Desert Highlands.

3909.name: Fast Asleep
3909.requirement: Defeat two of the Forged Exalted before they wake up.

3911.name: Expert Bounty Hunter
3911.description: No beast escapes once you're on the hunt.
3911.requirement: Complete champion bounties in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete the achievement "Crystal Oasis Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Desert Highlands Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Elon Riverlands Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "The Desolation Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Domain of Vabbi Champion Bounties."

3927.name: Terror of the Labyrinth
3927.requirement: Defeat one of the bosses in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3981.name: Istan Insight: Pillar of the Faithless
3981.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

4054.name: Holiday Food Drive
4054.requirement: Donate Wintersday foods to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

4089.name: Celestial Racer
4089.requirement: Complete the race event or time trial adventure in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year in under 3 minutes and 30 seconds.

4106.name: Lasting Bonds: What We Do Here

bits.text: Awarded from Lasting Bonds: Where We Come From.
Turn in a handwoven Olmakhan bandolier to Efi, near the southern gate of Atholma.
Defeat and collect the bounty for the gazelle Old Stonehoof.
Defeat and collect the bounty for the karka Ironshell.
Defeat the Spirit of the Storm in the Ruined Paths.
Defeat the elementals roaming the Hunting Grounds.
Collect from driftwood that washes up after the storm.
Find the location where Zohaqan would watch the sunrise.
Purchase from Researcher Thale near the Magnetics Lab.

4148.name: Sandswept Isles Champion Hunter
4148.requirement: Defeat each champion bounty in the Sandswept Isles at least once.

4159.name: Chairs of the World
4159.requirement: Sit in a wide variety of chairs across Tyria.

4165.name: Lost in Transit
4165.requirement: Locate unusual debris in Southsun Cove to help Ninn.

4222.name: Crab Kickin'
4222.description: Use crabs to fight the Awakened.
4222.requirement: Kick a surly crab toward the Awakened.

4273.name: Doobroosh Tranquilizer
4273.requirement: Defeat Doobroosh after he gains max stacks of Hormonal Imbalance.

4280.name: Bundle Looter
4280.requirement: Plunder 25 bundles of loot during the Labyrinthine Cliffs treasure hunt.

4304.name: Effigy Extinguisher
4304.description: The flame effigy appears during a bonus event upon completing a successful treasure hunt.
4304.requirement: Use water balloons scattered around the top of the Labyrinthine Cliffs to extinguish the flame effigy.

4315.name: Blobs, Schmobs
4315.requirement: Defeat Subject 7 without killing any oozes.

4347.name: Splat!
4347.requirement: Receive a hit from the Death-Branded Shatterer in an unexpected way.

4389.name: Historical Ambition
4389.description: If only it made a difference...
4389.requirement: Take down one of the leaders in the southern displacement.

4392.name: Legacy
4392.requirement: Regroup with your allies in the abandoned Sunspear sanctuary.

4412.name: Coalescence II: The Gift
4412.description: Its bloodlust somewhat lessened, your energy friend now desires to learn more about being. Also it wants a name.
4412.locked_text: Defeat a raid boss. (Only available to owners of Path of Fire.)

4472.name: Rolling Racer
4472.description: To finish first, you first have to finish.
4472.requirement: Complete all the normal-difficulty racing achievements to show your riding skill.

4528.name: Chasing Tales: Like a Wounded Beast
4528.description: In his final moments, Hakson swore that if he was to die, he would not die alone.
4528.requirement: While at 33% total health or less, slay five opponents in 5 minutes.

bits.text: While at 33% health or less, slay five enemies within 5 minutes of each other.

4562.name: Chasing Tales: Kobbel the Poetic
4562.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood greatsword and perform tasks to re-create Kobbel's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Kobbel the Poetic.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Kobbel: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Kobbel: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Kobbel: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Kobbel at a heroic font.

4567.name: Stubborn
4567.requirement: Complete the Crystal Dragon without accepting aid from the weaponsmith, armorsmith, or chef.

4598.name: Chasing Tales: Haliver the Seeker
4598.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood torch and perform tasks to re-create Haliver's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Haliver the Seeker.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Haliver: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Haliver: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Haliver: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Haliver at a heroic font.

4667.name: Skyscale Fever
4667.requirement: Feed Gorrik's medicine to each skyscale.

bits.text: Find the ailing skyscale in Sky's Reach.
Find the ailing skyscale in Grenth's Teeth.
Find the ailing skyscale in Necrotic Coast.
Find the ailing skyscale in Wing's Shadow.
Find the ailing skyscale in Ember Gate.
Find the ailing skyscale in Virulent Wastes.
Find the ailing skyscale in Scorched Cliffs.
Find the ailing skyscale in Umbral Battlegrounds.
Find the ailing skyscale in Dragon's Causeway.
Find the ailing skyscale in Gnarlgrove.
Find the ailing skyscale in the Skein.
Find the ailing skyscale in Crystal Wing.
Find the ailing skyscale in Melandru's Chalice.
Find the ailing skyscale in Mosswood.

4721.name: Scissors of Fate
4721.requirement: Help block the ley nodes that are healing Kralkatorrik in under 5 minutes.

4752.name: Skyscale Rider: Tarnished Coast
4752.description: Brisban Wildlands, Metrica Province, Caledon Forest, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom
4752.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in the Tarnished Coast.

4756.name: Bonus Event: Meta-Event Rush
4756.description: Participate in meta-events around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4770.name: Visions of Jahai
4770.description:
What is time to one who transcends it?

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
4770.requirement: Explore Jahai Bluffs for greater insight.
4770.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

4789.name: Duchess of the Arena
4789.requirement: Finish the season in 11th–25th place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4803.name: Rock Solid
4803.description: Dig deep to crack the foundations of corruption.
4803.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Adina while the challenge mote is active.

4837.name: (Annual) Winner's Circle
4837.requirement: Pick the winner in the Dragon Bash moa races. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4902.name: Merchandise Collector
4902.description: <c=@flavor>"My commander visited Bangar's rally and all I got was..."</c>

4933.name: Staying In Character
4933.requirement: Maintain your cover while on your clandestine mission in the chapter Deeper and Deeper.

4937.name: Daily Grothmar Seeker
4937.requirement: Play a game of hide-and-seek with the charr cub in the Blood Keep...and win.

4949.name: Grothmar Valley Historian
4949.requirement: Find all the ancient coins scattered across Grothmar Valley.

5104.name: It Keeps Coming Back
5104.requirement: Defeat Drakkar  times within its lair in Bjora Marches.

5194.name: Priority Strike: Boneskinner
5194.requirement: Defeat the boneskinner in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5196.name: Nicabar Steelweaver's Footsteps
5196.requirement:
Collect items related to Nicabar Steelweaver's history to earn his signature Steel Warband staff.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

bits.text: Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found in Eye of the North.
Found by talking to Marghel Talekeeper at Deathblade's Watch in Fields of Ruin.
Found in the Thunder Den at Thunderbreak Hills in Fields of Ruin.
Found inside the chest at the end of the Branded Mine in Fields of Ruin.
Found by completing the Ooze Pit trials or Demolition Derby in Grothmar Valley, while pledged to Blood.
Found in the Blood Keep in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the township of Claypool in Queensdale.
Found inside the chest at the end of The Long Way Around in Straits of Devastation.
Chance to drop from centaur enemies. Guaranteed from Modniir Ulgoth.
Crafted or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Found by interacting with any repair anvil.
Speak with Nicabar after defeating the Ancient Forgeman.
Found inside the chest atop Flame Legion camp in Grothmar Valley.
Created by mining Eternal Ice multiple times.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in Eye of the North after opening it with three crystals.

5213.name: Emblem of Victory
5213.requirement: Win  ranked matches during a PvP season.

5289.name: 3v3 Elite
5289.requirement: Finish a 3v3 mini-season in the top 250 on the skill rating leaderboard.

5315.name: Special Mission: Clear the Mine
5315.requirement: Defeat  Dominion charr in the Vloxen Mine sector of the Drizzlewood Coast.

5338.name: Glory to the Ash Legion
5338.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5366.name: One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion
5366.description: Journal: One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion Completed
5366.requirement: Complete the story chapter One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion.

5406.name: Special Mission: Northern Supply Lines
5406.description: <c=@flavor>The first step of sieging a citadel is to cut off its supplies.</c>
5406.requirement: Destroy  Dominion supply caravans in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5406.locked_text: Unlock by using Dominion Intel Documents.

5434.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Three
5434.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Three.

5581.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Fields of Ruin
5581.requirement: Complete the Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission.

5621.name: Daily: Skritt Donations
5621.requirement: Donate needed materials to the skritt.

5626.name: Skritt Supporter
5626.requirement: Purchase  Skritt Supply Box at the Eye of the North.

5764.name: Reconquer the Trap Maze
5764.requirement: Navigate Noran's secret trap maze and reach the treasure room.

5828.name: Treasure Hunter: Prospect Valley
5828.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in Prospect Valley, Dry Top.

5868.name: Return to The Charge
5868.requirement: Complete the story mission The Charge in Living World Season 4 Episode 2.

5899.name: Woodland Management: Domain of Kourna
5899.requirement: Log wood  times in the Domain of Kourna.

5919.name: Course Favorite: Sandswept Isles
5919.requirement: Complete any race event in the Sandswept Isles.

5948.name: Return to the Domain of Istan

5951.name: Second Response: Snowden Drifts
5951.requirement: Complete the Snowden Drifts Dragon Response Mission.

6153.name: Avid Shiverpeaks Fisher
6153.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6153.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the Shiverpeaks.

6214.name: New Kaineng Insight: Petrified Shipping Docks
6214.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6216.name: Daily Seitung Province Taskmaster
6216.description: Always happy to lend a hand.
6216.requirement: Complete a renown heart in Seitung Province.

6269.name: Cryptseeker
6269.requirement: Create etchings of three amber keystones around the Echovald Wilds.

bits.text: Recorded the symbols on the keystone at Saint Anjeka's Shrine.
Recorded the symbols on the keystone at Lake Lutgardis.
Recorded the symbols on the keystone at the Tangled Altar.

6282.name: The Hidden Vault
6282.requirement: Uncover the tragic tale behind the vault in the murky depths of Old Kaineng.

6309.name: High-Score Archery
6309.requirement: Earn 200 points in the archery contest.

6353.name: Priority Cantha Strike: Aetherblade Hideout
6353.requirement: Complete the Aetherblade Hideout Strike Mission.

6354.name: Aetherblade Hideout
6354.requirement: Complete the Aetherblade Hideout Strike Mission.

6391.name: Silenced Voices
6391.requirement: Complete Shisokana's special mission parameters inside the Speakers camp.

bits.text: Speak to Shisokana to receive further instructions.
Go to the Jade Brotherhood camp.
Steal the tech from the Jade Brotherhood lieutenant's chest.
Gain access to the Speaker ritualist's tent.
Plant the stolen tech in the Speaker ritualist's tent.
Inform the Speakers lieutenant of the ritualist's "betrayal."

6508.name: Not in This Neighborhood
6508.requirement: Kill  Purists in New Kaineng City.

6538.name: Alliance Investigation
6538.requirement: Complete the story chapter Alliance Investigation.

6543.name: Standing Together
6543.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission with challenge mode active after absorbing 5 Share the Void attacks.

6563.name: Check, First Mate
6563.description: Story Instance: No More Secrets—The Scene of the Crime
6563.requirement: Defeat First Mate Horrik within the time limit.

6595.name: Completing Renown Hearts IV
6595.requirement:
Complete  renown heart in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6625.name: Salvaging Items
6625.requirement:
Use a salvage kit to salvage  item.

<c=@reminder>Some items you'll find will be salvageable. Use a salvage kit to break them down into crafting materials.</c>

6666.name: Gathering Crafting Materials
6666.requirement:
Gather  material from resource nodes.

<c=@reminder>Resource nodes are clumps of ore, saplings, and plants that can be gathered using gathering tools. Nodes can be found by exploring the world.</c>

6847.name: Bloodthirst Manifest
6847.requirement: Acquire all items to manifest a bloodthirsty weapon.
6847.locked_text: Purchase the associated Historical Weapon Diagram from Requisitions Specialists in Gyala Delve to unlock.

6854.name: Tools of the Luxon Hunters
6854.requirement: Unlock all of the Luxon Hunter's weapons.

6907.name: The More the Merrier
6907.description: Snargle Goldclaw would have a field day if he found out about this!
6907.requirement: Partner with Ayumi, Canach, and Yao.

6929.name: New Kaineng Jade Bot Racer: Silver
6929.requirement: Complete the New Kaineng Jade Bot Racer adventure with a silver rating or better.

7000.name: Tower Insight: The Apex
7000.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in the Wizard's Tower.

7022.name: Tower Insight: A Bird's Eye View
7022.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in the Wizard's Tower.

7062.name: Forgotten Lore
7062.description: Fragments can be found by cleansing temples in Orr, in the Forgotten path in Arah, and at the ends of the Buried Archives and Antre of Adjournment jumping puzzles.
7062.requirement: Collect Fragments of Forgotten Lore from Various Locations in Orr

7125.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Rata Novus Foundations
7125.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7134.name: Skyscale Saddle Materials
7134.requirement: Collect all the materials for a skyscale saddle and bring them to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne.

bits.text: You received this from Skyscale Trainer Dyanne near the Beacon of Ages.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of the Natural in Amnytas.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of the Obscure in Amnytas.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner near Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03 in Skywatch Archipelago.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Strength in Amnytas.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at Rata Novus Promenade in Skywatch Archipelago.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Balance in Amnytas.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at Droknar's Light in Skywatch Archipelago.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at Wizard's Ascent in Skywatch Archipelago.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Skyward Marches in Skywatch Archipelago.
Purchase from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Knowledge in Amnytas.
Talk to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne near the Beacon of Ages once you've finished this list.

7171.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Above the Jungle
7171.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7191.name: Eternal Protector of the Rata Novus Promenade and Primal Maguuma
7191.requirement: Successfully complete events around the Rata Novus Promenade and Primal Maguuma.

bits.text: Help the Rata Novans prepare for a party. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony after preparing for a party. (Event 2 of 2)
Help the asuran researchers reach the source of abnormal energy. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the Kryptis after helping the asuran researchers. (Event 2 of 2)
Clear chak nests in the chak hatchery. (Event 1 of 2)
Collect chak energy and defend the battery. (Event 2 of 2)
Power Sentry L.O.X. with energy from the ley-line energy collectors.
Burn grubs and insects with your skyscale. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the possessed gargantuan grub. (Event 2 of 2)

7193.name: Skyfarer
7193.description: You've explored all major areas of Secrets of the Obscure.
7193.requirement: Explore all areas in Secrets of the Obscure.

bits.text: Explore all areas in Skywatch Archipelago.
Explore all areas in Inner Nayos.

7221.name: The World Spire
7221.requirement: Undertake a daring and dangerous mission to recover Isgarren before the Kryptis fully corrupt the ancient wizard.

7240.name: Astral Stride
7240.requirement: Gather the necessary armor skins and defeat Knaebelag the Terror to unlock the ability to purchase the Arcanum of Astral Stride from Lyhr, the wizard smith.

7566.name: Daily Fractal Rush
7566.requirement: Complete  fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

7825.name: The War Council
7825.requirement: Meet with your allies and venture further into Nayos.

7873.name: Legendary Conqueror of Cerus
7873.requirement: Complete the Temple of Febe Strike Mission after selecting a legendary challenge from the challenge mote.

7985.name: Blacktide Veteran
7985.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8020.name: Secrets of the Tower
8020.description: Bling-9009 has received reports of your exploits and now carries new items!
8020.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and defeat the final boss in the Lonely Tower fractal.

8093.name: Wow. That's Flashy Armor.
8093.requirement: Collect  unique legendary Suffused Obsidian armor skin.

8167.name: Hide-and-Seek: Silver
8167.requirement: Earn a silver medal in Hide-and-Seek.

8174.name: Penned by Poky
8174.requirement: Read the story that Poised Arrow wrote as a cub.

8176.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Severed Isle
8176.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8181.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Tumultuous Tree
8181.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8238.name: Lowland Shore Insight: "Battle of Ice" Memorial
8238.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8242.name: Competition Culture
8242.description: Test your mettle in the ring.
8242.requirement: Get a gold participation score for all of the events within the Sleuth Brawlfields.

bits.text: Help the kodan cubs defeat the training illusions.
Defeat the kodan cubs in a spear contest.

8324.name: The Tyrian Alliance
8324.requirement: Attend the inaugural Tyrian Alliance meeting.

8334.name: Firewatch
8334.description: The Kindle Barrens are vulnerable. Best help the lowlanders keep the fires at bay.
8334.requirement: Complete all of the "Clear out the elementals" events.

8560.name: Flawless Crafter
8560.description: Those are some smooth woodworking skills.
8560.requirement: Successfully craft your bows without missing a carve during the preparation for the central survey.

8612.name: Godsbane
8612.description: The titans are strangers no more.
8612.requirement: Complete achievements in the Mount Balrior raid instance.

8631.name: Legendary Blightbringer's Court
8631.requirement: Defeat Greer while the challenge mote is active.

8641.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Kryta
8641.requirement: Defeat bandit leaders in Central Tyria. Legendary bandit executioners will award more progress.

8805.name: Revenge of Ignaxious
8805.requirement: During the Road to Heitor meta-event in Inner Nayos, defeat Ignaxious.
